# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: http://localhost:5173
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- http://localhost:5173/
- http://localhost:5173/topics
- http://localhost:5173/pricing
- http://localhost:5173/faq

Topics (published):
- Agent vs Automation: http://localhost:5173/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t01-agent-vs-automation — A quick, practical guide to Agent vs Automation.
- The Observe → Think → Act Loop: http://localhost:5173/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t02-the-observe-think-act-loop — A quick win: understand The Observe → Think → Act Loop.
- Problem Framing for Agents: http://localhost:5173/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t03-problem-framing-for-agents — A short lesson to help you apply Problem Framing for Agents.

- Idempotency in Agent Actions: http://localhost:5173/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t05-idempotency-in-agent-actions — A 1-minute de-risking session on Idempotency in Agent Actions.
